modName: CN - Mixwater Mill Workers House Overhaul
summary: This is a simple overhaul of the Workers House at Mixwater Mill. You will find that the Workers House has been tidied up a bit to make it a suitable spot for people to occupy and not skeevers.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]CN [/size][/b][size=4][b]- Mixwater Mill Workers House Overhaul[/b][/size]
[b] [size=3]Requirements: [/size][/b][size=2]None. Just activate and play![/size]
[size=5][b]
YOU WILL NOT HAVE TO PAY TO USE MY MODS. THEY WILL ALWAYS BE FREE. [/b][/size]

This is a simple overhaul of the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Worker%27s_House]Workers House[/url] at [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Mixwater_Mill]Mixwater Mill[/url]. You will find that the Workers House has been tidied up a bit to make it a suitable spot for people to occupy and not skeevers. Inside there is now a fire going with a cooking pot to use, an extra bed, an Adventurer's Sack for the Player to store their items in (it won't respawn), and more decoration. Outside there are crops to harvest, cows, goats, and some decoration. I made it for my own playthrough, where I was role-playing as a worker at the Mill, but it can also work for the traveling Dragonborn and other role-playing scenarios just as well. I[size=2] hope you enjoy it, and if you have any ideas, please share.
[/size][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][b][size=3]Notes [size=2]
[/size][/size][/b][list][*][size=2]Has been cleaned of dirty edits with the tool TES5Edit[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]The [i]only [/i]player owned storage is the [url=http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58412-1-1419580540.jpg]Adventurers Sack[/url]. You can still store things in the other containers, but the Adventurers Sack was designated for the player to use.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[b][size=3]Compatibility[/size][/b]
[color=#ffd966]Not likely to work[/color] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37301/]MixwaterMill Reconstruction[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22592/]Argonian Settlement - Mixwater Mill[/url].
[color=#6aa84f]Works with[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] ([url=http://3dnpc.com/]3DNPC.com[/url]), [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26393/?]Vilja in Skyrim[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52513/?]Lonely Shack [/url]

[b] [size=3]Log[/size][/b]
[color=#ffd966]1.[size=2]2 [/size][/color][size=2]Added in an Adventurer's Sack for the Player, more decor, removed the stable and horse, and a
[/size][color=#ffd966]1.1[/color][size=2] Added in a stable, crops, domestic goats, and cleaned up the front of the workers house from the grass.[/size]
[size=3][size=2][b][size=3]
My Other Work[/size][/b]
[/size][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57668/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/tAQYEdN.png[/img][/url]
author: BrownPastel
